required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Protocol for Continued Patient Access to Study Drug
clinical_study.official_title: Protocol for Continued Patient Access to Study Drug

brief_summary.textblock: This study is for patients who have participated in a previous study and who continue to receive benefit to have continued access to study drug and/or treatment.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- To be eligible patients must be currently receiving benefit in a Lilly study that has met its endpoints or has otherwise stopped.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients must not be concurrently enrolled in any other type of medical research judged not to be scientifically or medically compatible with this study.

overall_official.last_name: Call 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559) or 1-317-615-4559 Mon - Fri 9 AM - 5 PM Eastern time (UTC/GMT -5 hours, EST)
